==SAMPLE 2==

I start my project base on the following product:
http://www.himodel.com/FPV_Telemetry/FPV_5.8G_32CH_Auto-scan_A_V_Receiver_RX_RC32S_32CH_Edition.html

This receiver didn't work for me, so I use it at base for my modification.
http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_00.jpg

First I remove all items like you can see here
http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_01.jpg

Now I search for all the pins we need for our modification

http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_01a.jpg

Check, if the Arduino board fit, I use Wattuino pro mini adv 5V/16MHz http://www.watterott.com/de/Wattuino-pro-mini-5V-16MHz
http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_03.jpg

I wire all cables
http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_04.jpg

Than I place the Arduino, I use an gyro tape
http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_05.jpg

then I complete the wire
http://rx5808-pro.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32CH-Receiver_06.jpg

By the way, I remove the bascom receiver my one, I'm sure I get SPI running
